item.title: David B. Himself
item.description:
I think the gutsiest part of the whole Olympic ceremony was not the "Last Supper" or not even the naked Philippe Katerine painted in blue (google him.)

I think it was the part with the beheaded Marie-Antoinettes, providing that Macron had a bunch of royals as guests of honor sitting next to him.

Also, I'm afraid many foreigners are missing an important piece of context for that part. The heavy metal band (called Gojira) and the beheaded Marie-Antoinettes were at the Conciergerie.

This building was the Royal Palace of France between the 11th and 14th Centuries (before moving to the Louvre and eventually Versailles). But it gets better. The Conciergerie was turned into a prison during the Revolution (because the Revolutionaries were cool like this) and it's the prison where... Marie-Antoinette spent her last days before being sent to the Guillotine, place de la Concorde (yes, the guillotine was where the obelisk stands nowadays).


#Paris2024 #ParisOlympics #France #MarieAntoinette

item.title: Dan Gillmor
item.description: Trump wasn't joking or being cleverly ambiguous when he told white Christian nationalists that this will be the last vote they need to make if they help elect him.But you can be sure Big Journalism will just laugh it off as another "there goes Trump again" minor story, or at most a one-day story.If Harris said something like this, you would never hear the end of it. https://www.mediaite.com/trump/trump-cryptically-declares-you-wont-have-to-vote-anymore-if-he-wins-second-term/amp/

item.description: "Herzlich willkommen sagt auch das Team vom Bordbistro. Und jetzt halten Sie sich fest: Alles funktioniert, alles ist da! Also bis gleich." (@neonlicht) #BahnAnsagen

item.title: Jon Worth
item.description:
German Finance Minister Lindner (FDP) has done an interview with HandelsblattDamn it's *grim*"Manche geben sich der Hoffnung hin, mit Kamala Harris würde alles einfacher werden als mit Donald Trump. Dazu gehöre ich nicht.”"Some people hope that everything will be easier with Kamala Harris than with Donald Trump. I am not one of them.”What sodding planet is he on?Link to the whole interview in German
https://www.bundesfinanzministerium.de/Content/DE/Interviews/2024/2024-07-26-handelsblatt.html

item.title: Electronic Frontier Foundation
item.description: Thanks to you, the PRO Codes Act—which would let industry giants control access to the law—failed to pass in the House of Representatives. Make sure the Senate gets the same message. https://act.eff.org/action/tell-congress-don-t-let-anyone-own-the-law

item.title: Defending Ukraine
item.description:
KYIV INDEPENDENT:
Polish Foreign Ministry suggests Hungary leave EU, NATO after Orban's controversial statements "I do not understand why Hungary wants to remain a member of organizations that they dislike so much and that supposedly mistreat them," Polish Deputy Foreign Minister Wladyslaw Teofil Bartoszewski said. https://kyivindependent.com/polish-foreign-ministry-suggests-hungary-leave-eu-nato-after-orbans-controversial-statements/ #Ukraine

item.title: Jay Kuo
item.description: 100 days can feel like a political eternity, and they can also fly by quickly! Today, I discuss the state of the campaigns and the road ahead. Link to my piece: https://open.substack.com/pub/statuskuo/p/the-next-100-days?r=1zr8b&utm_campaign=post&utm_medium=web&showWelcomeOnShare=true
